locations.name: One Farrer Hotel
locations.description:
Sleek hotel complex above Farrer Park metro, 4 km from Chinatown and 6 km from Singapore Botanic Gardens. Modern rooms, apartments, and villas with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and rainfall showers. Dining options include a buffet restaurant, trendy bar, hip cafeteria, and international eatery. Outdoor pool, spa, 24/7 gym, chocolate shop, meeting space, and ballroom.

Check-in: 15:00
Check-out: 12:00.
